quote: I am not thinking that because people say I am great that I really am great. I am just doing a job, just like everybody else. The only difference is that a lot more people see what I do.

Obviously being in Los Angeles plays a huge role in the publicity. We don't have a football team in L.A., so we kind of are like the pro team.

The only difference between the saint and the sinner is that every saint has a past, and every sinner has a future.
The only difference between me and a madman is that I'm not mad.

The only difference between a good shot and a bad shot is if it goes in or not.

The only difference is I'm coming at it under hip-hop.
